solution_line_template: Janet needs {children_count} lunches for the kids + {chaperone_count} for the chaperones + {janet_count} for herself + {additional_lunches} extras = <<{children_count}+{chaperone_count}+{janet_count}+{additional_lunches}={total_lunches}>>{total_lunches} lunches.
Each lunch is ${cost_per_lunch}, so lunch for the field trip costs ${cost_per_lunch} per lunch * {total_lunches} lunches = $<<{cost_per_lunch}*{total_lunches}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} total
